title: Authority Credential API
description: A list of supported credentials and associated API endpoints for the Authority

credentialType.description: The type of credential issued by the authority. Corresponds to the CredentialType field of a VerifiableCredential.

apiEndpoints.description: The necessary REST API endpoints that enables keeper to communicate with an authority.

credentialIssuance.description: The endpoint for issuing this credential.

credentialRequirements.description: The endpoint for providing a list of VerifiableCredentials required to issue this credential.

presentationVerification.description: The endpoint for verifying VerifiablePresentations including this credential.
